<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Weight = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals/#a7645b48e30da2e9ae644b6ade5663dbb">LiveIntervals::getSpillWeight</a>(Writes, Reads, &amp;MBFI, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, PSI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Writes &amp;&amp; IsExiting &amp;&amp; LIS.isLiveOutOfMBB(LI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Weight &#42;= 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotalWeight += Weight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark li as unspillable if all live ranges are tiny and the interval</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is not live at any reg mask.  If the interval is live at a reg mask</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spilling may be required. If li is live as use in statepoint instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spilling may be required due to if we mark interval with use in statepoint</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as not spillable we are risky to end up with no register to allocate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At the same time STATEPOINT instruction is perfectly fine to have this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand on stack, so spilling such interval and folding its load from stack</span></CodeLine>
